snippet.title: Winged Game! English trailer
snippet.description:
🌟 Welcome to the Winged Universe! 🌟 
Travel in a unique universe where games and literature meet to enchant and entertain everyone! Go on a journey through magical worlds, collect book pages, overcome obstacles, earn collectibles and abilities, and face terrifying Bosses! 

🦋Give wings to your imagination, experiencing the emotions of the fantastic worlds of "Winged", inspired by classics of global children's literature, such as: "Alice Through the Looking Glass", "Little Red Riding Hood", "Wizard of Oz", "Don Quixote", "Scheherazade and the Arabian Nights", "Peter Pan", "The Little Prince", "The Boy with the Green Finger", "Jack and the Beanstalk" and "Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea.” 

🌟 Are you ready for this new adventure? 

During Gameplay, the player will find different “wings” that release special abilities! And it will unlock books in the library that will give you incredible power-ups! 

🦋The game mixes action, adventure and the passion for reading, creating a magical and educational experience for children and adults.

🌟 "Winged" is a Brazilian game inspired by the book “Menina de Asas”, by Pablo Morenno, produced by Druzina Content, winning the Transmedia Narratives for Childhood and Youth Animation and Electronic Game Short Film tender from the Ministry of Culture in partnership with Ancine, through the Audiovisual Sector Fund. It also has a partnership with Sorora Game Studio, which is made up of a team of female developers.

🦋Being an auto-runner platformer, it unlocks books as you play! Embark on a magical journey with the character Ruth, where each page collected opens doors to exciting literary adventures.

The game is available in Brazilian Portuguese, English, Spanish, German, French, Italian and Chinese (simplified).

📱Available on the App Store, Play Store and Galaxy Store.

❤️Stay tuned here on our channel for more news! 

#Winged #DruzinaContent #Game #AutoRunner #Literature #Adventure #Kids #Fantasia 

Credits
Project Manager / Head of Programming: Luciana Druzina
Game Designer / Narrative Designer: Luciana Druzina
Executive production: Amanda Ruano and Éder Rösner
Executive production assistance / Tester: Daniela Azeredo
Executive production assistance: Duda Feistauer, Giovanna Guedes and Isabella Fontanari
Production coordination / Post-production coordination: Melina Galante
Adaptation of literary works: Saskia Sá
Textual review: Mônica Fagundes da Silva

Sorora Game Studio
Programmer: Ana Luyza
Game designer: Alana Ramos
Animator: Felipe Peruzzo
2D Artist: Isadora Rizzato Pohlmann
Producer, technical artist and 2D artist: Kassiana Fritz
Administrative Director: Michele Weber
2D Artist and UI Designer: Vick Périco

Radioactive Game Sounds
Original Music: Gustavo Blank
Matheus Herrmann: Lucas Corrêa
Sound Design: Thiago Grün and Lucas Figueiredo
Voices: Thiago Grün and Carina Donida
